name: Tiki Match
description:
The Tiki is back!
with a fresh and new approach to match 3 games!

Enjoy this unique Match-3 game, fully loaded with awesome features, among them:
- 4 game modes
- Fully universal support
- Retina graphics
- Beautiful visuals and animations
- Awesome music and sounds
- Designed for color-blind people in mind as well !

Slide your fingers on the screen to move the rows and columns and have more fun than ever!

From the creators of Tiki Totems, Tiki Totems 2 and Tiki Lavalache comes the latest entry in the Tiki saga - Tiki Match!
